text: obava utpādanaya kaḷē allāhya. pasuva ohuma obava maraṇayaṭa pat karannēya. igena gena dæna siṭiyada, kisivak nodannā aya men bavaṭa pat vana mahaḷu viya dakvā jīvatva siṭina ayada obagen æta. (obagen kavurun, kavurunva kopamaṇa kalak athæra damā siṭiya yutuda yanna) niyata vaśayenma allāh hon̆din danneku hā (esē kirīmaṭa) itāmat balasampannayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya
